transcript:
Customer: Hello, aayiye madam.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Line par hai ek bhaiya.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Aare side pe chal dega.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji madam bataye kya aapko kya dikat aa rahi thi aapko?
Customer: Aap join to kariye pehle, pehle us link ko to join kariye sir, mai wait kar rahi hu, link join nahi kar rahe aap.
Customer: Ek minute, to kisko bheja hai? Vikas tere paas aaya hoga?
Customer: Mere pe kaha aaya hai?
Customer: Fir kiske paas aaya? Number kiska hai? Papa ka hai?
Customer: Koi mail nahi aaya abhi. Ha to abhi, ha wahi to de raha hu.
Customer: Aare bhi gaya. Meeting link nahi aaya aapke paas? Meeting link nahi aaya?
Customer: Nahi koi nahi aaya.
Executive: Vr343720@gmail.com mail id pe gaya hai.
Customer: Ha ji. Teri hi hai to yahi hai.
Executive: Koi baat nahi hum aapko whatsapp pe bhej de usko join kar lenge.
Customer: Okay. Number bataiye, number bataiye apna.
Customer: 9193
Customer: 9193
Customer: 96 sorry.
Customer: 96 96
Customer: 9696
Customer: 9193967074.
Executive: 7074.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Message aaya aapke paas?
Customer: Aa gaya.
Executive: Ji sahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai, abhi kya hai na sorry wait aapko dekhna meeting link bheja hai humne pehle mera number save kare tabhi wo link aap join kar payenge, theek hai? Ye jo link hai na, ha save kar liya isko bas join kar, isko join kar.
Customer: Link ho gaya.
Customer: Nahi to kya hai abhi, abhi, abhi call kar raha mai tumhe.
Customer: Ha, abhi call kar raha mai tumhe zara.
Customer: Accha chal theek hai pehle karwa de.
Customer: Theek hai, yaha pe laga rahe.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji madam.
Executive: Theek hai join kar liya na, abhi unmute kariyega zara waha se, aapki aawaz aati hai waha se dekhe.
Customer: Nahi aayi.
Executive: Unmute kariye na aap, aap khud mute pe hai, unmute kariye pehle.
Customer: Kar diya ji, kar diya ji. Aari hai na aawaz meri?
Executive: Ji system pe. Chaliye yaha se hum call disconnect kar rahe hai, theek hai wahi baat karke.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to join meeting link.

Resolution:

- Executive sent the meeting link on WhatsApp.

- Executive guided to unmute to speak.

Next Steps: 

- None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting link, whatsapp, unmute
